replies.body: why you gotta make me update my client,you monsters how fucking dare you.
how do I update new client from old client?
It's up now, we were the first region to have it unlocked but it's rolling out around the world right now.
Hey Rito Gehirn, I don't seem to have the Practice Tool available to me. I'm on 7.3, but I don't see it anywhere?!
You'll find it under the "Training" section in the game mode selection screen. It's also only available through the new client.

I don't like how Practice Tool still operates as a "normal game", i.e. if you want to leave, you get a prompt that your team (what team??) needs you and that you may be dishonoured or w/e, AND that you also get a prompt for being "AFK" even if I'm spending a lot of time on the purchase item screen. I'm sure you don't get dishonoured, but I didn't want to risk it, so I surrendered

To me just these 2 things that I noticed don't belong in Practice Tool

This is possibly bug related, I couldn't attack turrets after reenabling them, and I somehow lagged throughout the session, and was d/c after I left, had trouble reconnecting. Restarted my pc and that worked

Just a question, if the server load isn't too high, will the practice tool also be implemented onto the old (legacy) client? The alpha (new) client runs pretty badly on macs (what I'm on) and is extremely laggy to play on. Will we eventually have to upgrade to the alpha? And when will that be? Thanks a ton!
Really wished they made it so all the champions are available in Training so you can practice them and learn them
rip, now im only playing practice
TY RITO, NOW I DONT HAVE TO GO ON PBE WITH 200 PING {{item:3070}}
Is practice tool coming on old client as well?
cant even invite people dispite there being a invite button in lobby
